original_text: But woe to them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
korean_text: 그 날에는 아이 밴 자들과 젖먹이는 자들에게 화가 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: But woe to them that are with child
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아이를 가진 자들에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: and to them that give suck
